attributes.action: Our troops Deserve to be treated in Military Hospitals
attributes.additional_details:
The United Kingdom has no dedicated Military Hospitals, we send our troops overseas to fight / protect our interests / Freedom, yet we won't support them properly when they come home Injured or scared.

As a previous serving Soldier Military Hospitals are essential to keep our Armed forces in the best condition.

Our Veterans have to wait in line for NHS treatment (might be quicker if they are injured).

It's time we looked after our Service people and Veterans.

They deserve it.
